messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Circa 9:20 PM, 20 November 2023 -Detective Ravel joined forces with Detective Sergeant Potter and Ms. Eleanor MARTINEZ. Session venue: Westside Sheriff's Post, 288 Orchid Avenue, Midville. Eleanor seemed ANXIOUS, words jumbled.  By 10:10 PM that evening, Technician Lucy Brighton from Sheriff's Crime Scene Team makes her entrance. Engaging Detective Ravel, she presented a collection of shattered porcelain. Pieces likely from a priced Vase. Brighton snapped Shots of footprints, muddy, outside Martinez's Backdoor. Vehicle driven was J. 521, it's said.  CARRIED FORWARD TO:  DETECTIVE DIVISION Detective L. Ravel Oddly calm NIGHT. Detective Ravel and Sergeant Potter ventured to Martinez Residence, Close to 457 PineBROOK Lane, around 10:55 PM. Outdoor lights: BROKEN. Potential entry point detected - rear window.  Mark Adams, from Crime Scene Division: was seen at work. Bedroom disarray. Seems like a Hasty search. Adams seizes scattered papers - seems IMPORTANT. Potential clue?  Neighbor - Oliver Crane, says a Van. Dark, no visible Plates. Spotted. Pre-incident. Revving loudly. Quick Departure observed.  Morning, 21 November 2023. Ravel receives Info from Officer Talia Hart. Dark van located. Derelict area. Midville's outskirts. Driver: Brian McKenna, Past RECORDS, multiple. Not Speaking. Held for more probes.  Near 3 PM, Martinez Reviews video footages, Midville Investigations Wing. Van seen. Near her house. BUT poor video Quality. No clear faces.  Footage retrieved by Tech Adams. 3:30 PM, this DATE: Lawyer Joseph Milford present, ensures fair process for McKenna.  Report holds: Oliver Crane's detailed OBSERVATION, McKenna's background CHECK, and snapshots from surveillance. These Elements, collectively, considered this report's body.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective Ravel Officer Context: Circa 9:20 PM, 20 November 2023, Detective Ravel joined forces with Detective Sergeant Potter and Ms. Eleanor Martinez. By 10:10 PM that evening, Technician Lucy Brighton engages Detective Ravel. Oddly calm night, Detective Ravel and Sergeant Potter ventured to the Martinez Residence. In the morning of 21 November 2023, Ravel receives information from Officer Talia Hart. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Detective Sergeant Potter Officer Context: Circa 9:20 PM, 20 November 2023, Detective Ravel joined forces with Detective Sergeant Potter and Ms. Eleanor Martinez. Later that night, Detective Ravel and Sergeant Potter ventured to the Martinez Residence. Officer Role: Detective Sergeant  Officer Name: Technician Lucy Brighton Officer Context: By 10:10 PM that evening, Technician Lucy Brighton from the Sheriff's Crime Scene Team makes her entrance. Engaging Detective Ravel, she presented a collection of shattered porcelain and snapped shots of footprints outside Martinez's backdoor. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Mark Adams Officer Context: Mark Adams from the Crime Scene Division was seen at work at the Martinez Residence. Bedroom in disarray. Adams seizes scattered papers that seem important. Footage was also retrieved by Tech Adams at 3:30 PM on the same date. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Officer Talia Hart Officer Context: In the morning of 21 November 2023, Ravel receives information from Officer Talia Hart. A dark van was located in a derelict area on Midville's outskirts. Officer Role: Officer
